Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Description: A banker is wrongly imprisoned for murder and forms a lasting friendship while maintaining hope and dignity through decades in Shawshank State Penitentiary.

Title: Inception
Description: A skilled thief enters people's dreams to steal secrets, but is challenged with planting an idea that could change everything.

Title: The Godfather
Description: The aging patriarch of a crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son, exploring loyalty, power, and family.

Title: The Dark Knight
Description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who threatens Gotham City, testing the hero's limits and moral code.

Title: Interstellar
Description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity as Earth faces environmental collapse.

Title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
Description: The adventures of a legendary concierge and his protégé unfold in a luxurious European hotel between the wars.

Title: Pulp Fiction
Description: Interconnected stories of crime, redemption, and dark humor collide in Los Angeles, blending violence with unforgettable dialogue.

Title: Forrest Gump
Description: Forrest Gump, a man of simple mind but big heart, witnesses and influences historical events while searching for love and purpose.

Title: Fight Club
Description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club with a soap salesman, spiraling into chaos and self-discovery.

Title: The Matrix
Description: A hacker discovers the reality he knows is a simulation and joins a rebellion to free humanity from the machines.

Title: Goodfellas
Description: The rise and fall of Henry Hill in the mafia world exposes loyalty, betrayal, and the costs of a life of crime.

Title: Se7en
Description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as a motif for his gruesome crimes.

Title: The Silence of the Lambs
Description: A young FBI cadet seeks the help of imprisoned cannibal Hannibal Lecter to catch another serial killer.

Title: Saving Private Ryan
Description: During World War II, soldiers risk everything to find and bring home a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

Title: Gladiator
Description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and destroyed his life.

Title: The Green Mile
Description: A death row prison guard witnesses supernatural events surrounding a gentle giant with extraordinary healing powers.

Title: Titanic
Description: A young couple falls in love aboard the doomed RMS Titanic, facing tragedy and enduring love against all odds.

Title: The Departed
Description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police force try to identify each other while infiltrating a Boston crime syndicate.

Title: Whiplash
Description: A young drummer strives for greatness under a ruthless music instructor, testing the limits of ambition and obsession.

Title: The Prestige
Description: Two magicians engage in a fierce rivalry, pushing the boundaries of obsession, deception, and sacrifice.

Title: The Lion King
Description: A lion prince flees his kingdom after the murder of his father, then grows to reclaim his throne and embrace his destiny.
